transportAdvice: Memphis has a limited public bus network that does not comprehensively cover tourist areas, so most visitors rely on taxis, rental cars, or rideshare services to get around; the main tourist strip along Beale Street is walkable, but the broader city is not pedestrian-friendly.

weather.description: Cold and occasionally wet with possible frost, making it the chilliest month of the year.
Still cool with frequent rain showers and occasional wintry mix possible.
Temperatures begin to warm noticeably but spring storms and rain are common.
Pleasant warming temperatures but April brings some of the highest rainfall of the year.
Warm and increasingly humid with a mix of sunny days and afternoon thunderstorms.
Hot and humid with long sunny days and occasional heavy thunderstorms.
The hottest month of the year with oppressive humidity and frequent afternoon storms.
Remains intensely hot and humid, very similar to July with little relief overnight.
Heat begins to ease slightly and rainfall decreases, making it a more comfortable month.
Crisp and pleasant autumn weather with low rainfall and comfortable temperatures.
Noticeably cooler with increasing cloud cover and occasional rain as winter approaches.
Cold and damp with a chance of frost or light snow, typical of a mid-South winter.
